name: 2D Shooter Modifications
description:
2D shooter game (modified)

Modifications include:

- Three different levels

- Varied background colors in each level

- New boundaries

- Map obstacles in level 1

- Different enemy colors

- Increased enemy speed (varies by color and size)

- Increased enemy health (varies by color and size)

- Increased enemy amount each level

- Different player color

- Increased player speed

- Increased player health

- New game music created and imported into levels 1-3

Created by Aryan Singh
